opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Ford Motor Co. v. Alexander Park

opinion:
360 U.S. 251

79 S.Ct. 1284

3 L.Ed.2d 1253

FORD MOTOR CO.
v.
Alexander PARK et al.

No. 831.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 8, 1959

Messrs. William T. Gossett and L. Homer Surbeck, for appellant.

Messrs. Abraham L. Zwerdling and Harold A. Cranefield, for appellees Parks and others.

Messrs. Paul L. Adams, Atty.Gen. of Michigan, Stanton S. Faville, Chief Asst.Atty.Gen., and Samuel J. Torina, Sol.Gen., for appellee Attorney General of Michigan.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a subsant ial federal question.
